profile_summary: I'm Muhammed Siyad P, a seasoned software developer with a strong background in crafting scalable and efficient solutions. With expertise in Python and C++, I've built a diverse portfolio of 15 open-source projects, available on GitHub, that demonstrate my ability to translate complex ideas into tangible codes. I'm passionate about driving innovation and continually expanding my skill set to tackle emerging technologies, and I'm excited to collaborate with like-minded professionals who share my enthusiasm for software development.
